name: Affair (itch)
description:
You are late to dinner. You're picking up your girlfriend, but she's not picking up her phone. You don't know where she is, so you go investigate, but you don't find the answers you're wanting to find.

Affair is a Prototype game built in 3 short days. The game is a exploration game, exploring the apartment of your girlfriend, finding out where they are.

The game features:

  1. Multiple Endings
  2. Voice Acting
  3. Items to collect
  4. A stove
